DOC.brief_summary: Human papillomaviruses (HPVs) are the most common of sexually transmitted viral agents and they are associated with genital and oral diseases. Agreement between cervical and oral HPV infection has been described from a small group of patient. Our study, performed on a greater number of patients, will provide a good estimation of this link, between cervical and oral infection, in a French population of women with a primary cervical HPV infection.
DOC.brief_title: Agreement Between Oral and Cervical Human Papillomavirus Infection in a French Cohort
